NAME tea
DLG ITM_0

DLG SPR_0
I'm a bee (dialogue WIP) 

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_1
Good morning worker #1758. Here's hoping to another productive day here at honey hive #37 (Worker bee #1) 

DLG SPR_2
Mornin' #1758. It's always nice to see your lovely wings flying around. Unlike our lazy neighbor over there.That guy always kills my buzz. (Bumble bee #1)        

DLG SPR_3
"""
Halt! You can not pass until the queen is fully sassified with royal jelly! I will swat you done with my mighty squisher! And don't even think of flying over me, this weapon has anti-air capabilities!(mercenary ant #2) 
     
"""

DLG SPR_4
Stop! You think you have gathered enough royal jelly to go to the outside land! Ha! I will spray you down from the heavens if you dare to try and pass me! (mercenary ant #1)    

DLG SPR_5
mercenary ants huh? Can't bee-lieve. Don't you think they would have been better off hiring mantises rather than those runts? (mantis #1) 

DLG SPR_6
It's pathetic right? One of those runts tried to spray me at the door. Says he fought off one of the giants and won that weapon in a 'glorious battle'. What a bunch of bee S. 

DLG SPR_7
I heard they actually did kill a human. That swatter is the same one that splatted my cousin, I watched it happen. Theres no other way he could have that beside from splatting the splatter. I wouldn't mess with them if I were you. ( Fly #1)    

DLG SPR_8
I'm so sorry about your cousin. I heard my aunt went out the same way. But I'm not letting an ant do me in like my aunt. If this wasn't the best hive in town to get honey I would be flying out that door right now. (Fly#2).  

VAR a
42
